name: It's a cool night, and you can't sleep, so you say hello to the cows. (Sys Req: 150mhz Pentium, 64MB RAM)
name_original: It's a cool night, and you can't sleep, so you say hello to the cows. (Sys Req: 150mhz Pentium, 64MB RAM)
description:
I'm working towards building a very lightweight virtual scene which could run on my Pentium 150 laptop from 1997. This was created in Blender 2.49 (for nostalgia) and I hope to add to it as I get inspiration. This game is heavily inspired by the Hard Drivin' and Race Drivin' arcade games.

I've included the .blend file so you may play around with the files. Enjoy!

-Rinoa
